text: Kaare Reidar Norum (24 December 1932 â€“ 22 November 2019) was a Norwegian educator and nutritionist. He was born in Oslo. He was hired as a docent at the University of Oslo in 1969. He became a professor in 1972. He was vice dean of the Faculty of Medicine from 1983 to 1985, dean from 1986 to 1988 and rector from 1999 to 2001. He was a member of the Norwegian Academy of Science and Letters from 1986 until his death. Norum became a member of in 1971 and has chaired the council several times. He worked with Ingrid Espelid Hovig. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Scientists from Oslo Category:Norwegian educators
title: Kaare R. Norum
